title: Siegel Rewards Program, No long term lease required, Bad Credit Ok
posting_body: ['Twain Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Full kitchen in apartment', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Walk to Las Vegas Strip', '-High-speed wireless internet available', '-Easy freeway access', '-Free premium cable TV', '-Fully furnished apartments', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Rent by the week or month', '-Free utilities included with apartment', '-No long term lease required', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
